```{r warning=FALSE}
# library(rjson)
library(jsonlite)

```


```{r}
tweet_no <- fromJSON(txt = 'data/aborto_twitter/tweets_no.json',flatten = TRUE )
tweet_si <- fromJSON(txt = 'data/aborto_twitter/tweets_si.json',flatten = TRUE )

```

```{r}
range(tweet_si$created_at)

columnas <- c('id','text','favorite_count','retweet_count', 'created_at','user.statuses_count','user.description','user.friends_count')


df <- tweet_no %>% 
  select(columnas) %>% 
  mutate(grupo='antiIVE') %>% 
  bind_rows(
  tweet_si %>% 
  select(columnas) %>% 
  mutate(grupo='proIVE'))
  
```
